titleStmt.title: A discourse concerning riots Occasioned by some of the people called Quakers, being imprisoned and indicted for a riot, for only being at a peaceable meeting to worship God. Written by one of that people, Thomas Ellwood.
titleStmt.author: Ellwood, Thomas, 1639-1713.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Benjamin Clark in George-Yard in Lombard-Street,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library.
